metadata.title: CVE-2023-37210 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A website could prevent a user from exiting full-screen mode via alert andprompt calls. This could lead to user confusion and possible spoofingattacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
